title: Gray River
blocka: Action: Convert any number of timber dice into fortune dice.

title: Mirror Woods, Magical
blocka: Action: Ongoing Conquest.
blockb: Immediate: Spend 8 progress to raise timber track by one.
blockc: (DISASTER) Test: Survival 3. Failure: All characters are weary.

title: Exposed Overlook
blocka: Action: Ongoing Survival.
blockb: Action: Spend progress. 4: +1 timber die. 7: +2 timber dice. 9: +3 timber dice. 10: +4 timber dice.
blockc: (CALAMITY) A fire breaks out! Lose all progress on this location.

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 lore.
blockb: (SORCERY) Test: Lore 2. Failure: One character is shaken.

title: The Necromancer
blocka: Test: Lore 3. Success: Burn card. Failure: 1 discord.
blockb: (WEIRD) Test: Lore 3. Failure: One character is wounded.

title: Undead Minions
blocka: Test: Combat 2. Sucess: Discard. Failure: 1 discord.
blockb: (GANG) Test: Combat 1 for each undead. Failure: 1 discord for each undead.

title: Searching the Banks
blocka: Placement: Gray River
blockc: Action: Spend 5 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: Scouting Ahead
blocka: Placement: Exposed Overlook
blockc: Action: Spend 4 progress. Unlock Mission: Sightrock. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: Scouting Ahead
blocka: Placement: Mirror Woods
blockc: Action: Spend 4 progress. Unlock Mission: Gray Forest. Move to stage 3. Burn card.

title: The Necromancer's Dark Heart
blocka: Placement: Musty Tomb
blockc: Action: Spend 5 progress. Unlock Character: Oniri. MISSION COMPLETE.

title: Undead Minions
blocka: Test: Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: 1 discord.
blockb: (GANG) Test: Combat 1 for each undead. Failure: 1 discord for each undead.

title: Food Source
blocka: Action: +3 Food. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Food track. Burn card.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Action: +3 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Timber track. Burn card.

title: Ore Source
blocka: Action: +3 Ore. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Ore track. Burn card.

title: Mana Source
blocka: Action: +3 Mana. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Mana track. Burn card.

title: Engines of Progress
blocka: Action: Make a Red Bank Conquest test. For every success, place one progress in any Red Bank wilderness location.

title: Poisonous Dusk Frogs
blocka: Solo Combat: 1. Success: +1 Combat. Burn card. Failure: Exhausted.

title: Forest Boar
blocka: Lowest Combat: 1. Failure: Weary.

title: Rocky Terrain
blocka: Survival: 2. Failure: 2 discord.

title: Storms
blocka: Survival: 2. Failure: 2 discord.

title: Libram of Animation
blocka: Solo Lore: 1. Success: +1 Lore. Burn card. Failure: Angry.

title: Logging Operation
blocka: Placement: Gray River

title: Undead Minions
blocka: Test: Combat 2. Success: Discard. Failure: 1 discord.
blockb: (GANG) Test: Combat 1 for each undead. Failure: 1 discord for each undead.

title: Grueling Wilds
blocka: Placement: On character with lowest survival.
blockc: On Movement: If character moves out of North Oaks location, remove condition.
